alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 6:55PM CST until February 06 at 7:30AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New Orleans LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Wolf River Above Gulfport affecting Harrison County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wolf River Above Gulfport. * WHEN...From late Friday night to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Bells Ferry Road will begin to flood. There will be water over the access road just upstream of the bridge and the road will become impassable very quickly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 8.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.5 feet on 01/14/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
